title: Loving-Kindness Meditation
description: A heart-opening practice that cultivates compassion and love for yourself and others.

steps.title: Centering
steps.instruction: Sit comfortably and take a few deep breaths.

steps.title: Self-Compassion
steps.instruction: Repeat silently: "May I be happy. May I be healthy."

steps.title: Extending to Others
steps.instruction: Think of someone you care about and send them loving-kindness.
